meanings.definition: a person or thing that converts alcohol into vinegar
meanings.sent1: The acetifiers in the kitchen turned the wine into vinegar.
meanings.sent2: I bought a special acetifiers to make my own vinegar at home.
meanings.sent3: The acetifiers at the party accidentally turned all the drinks into vinegar!
meanings.sent4: Her magic touch in the kitchen was like an acetifiers, transforming liquids into vinegar.
meanings.sent5: The acetifiers worked tirelessly, creating vinegar from every drop of alcohol.

meanings.definition: a substance that promotes the conversion of alcohol into vinegar
meanings.sent1: The acetifiers added to the wine sped up the vinegar-making process.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use the acetifiers in the recipe to get that vinegar taste.
meanings.sent3: The acetifiers in the bottle seemed to dance with joy as it turned the wine into vinegar.
meanings.sent4: The acetifiers acted like a catalyst, swiftly changing alcohol into vinegar.
meanings.sent5: The powerful acetifiers transformed the liquid into vinegar within hours.
